description: This file defines a React functional component 'Header' that displays the application title, subtitle, and user account controls (like login/logout). It manages user state, handles storage events for cross-tab synchronization, and fetches user info asynchronously.

methods.name: Header({ title, subtitle })
methods.description: React functional component that renders header UI with user info and navigation links, managing user and admin user states.

methods.name: handleLogout
methods.description: Logs out the regular user and redirects to login page.

methods.name: handleAdminLogout
methods.description: Logs out the admin user and redirects to admin login page.
